channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The Strongest Geomagnetic Storm of the Year Is Here. Auroras Could Shine in These States
item.description: The Sun recently unleashed a series of violent solar flares in Earth's direction.

item.title: SpaceX’s Starlink secures more spectrum and airlines as it passes 8 million customers
item.description: The internet provider has bought more 'direct to cell' spectrum licenses from EchoStar and struck a deal with the owner of British Airways.

item.title: FBI subpoenas the web registrar behind Archive.is
item.description: The FBI is attempting to track down the identity of the owner of Archive.today and its numerous mirrors, like Archive.is and Archive.ph. As reported by 404 Media, the FBI subpoena, which was posted on the official Archive.today X account, was sent to web domain registrar Tucows on October 30th demanding the “customer or subscriber name, […]

item.title: New US Senate bill calls for agencies and companies to be forced to report AI-related job cuts
item.description: Proposal would require companies and federal agencies to disclose AI-related workforce impacts.

item.title: Moonshot's Kimi K2 Thinking emerges as leading open source AI, outperforming GPT-5, Claude Sonnet 4.5 on key benchmarks
item.description: Even as concern and skepticism grows over U.S. AI startup OpenAI's buildout strategy and high spending commitments, Chinese open source AI providers are escalating their competition and one has even caught up to OpenAI's flagship, paid proprietary model GPT-5 in key third-party performance benchmarks with a new, free model. The Chinese AI startup Moonshot AI’s new Kimi K2 Thinking model, released today, has vaulted past both proprietary and open-weight competitors to claim the top position in reasoning, coding, and agentic-tool benchmarks. Despite being fully open-source, the model now outperf...

item.title: Le Samsung Galaxy XR en France ? On connaît sa date de sortie
item.description: Le Galaxy XR existe, il tourne sous Android XR. SamMobile annonce l'arrivée du Galaxy XR en France courant 2026.

item.title: Meta brings its short-form video feed of AI slop to Europe
item.description: Meta says that since the launch of Vibes, media generation in the Meta AI app has jumped more than tenfold.

item.title: You can now make your own Wordle puzzles
item.description: If you’ve ever wanted to make your own Wordle puzzle to challenge (or annoy) your family and friends, The New York Times has announced an official tool that lets you do that. If you have an All Access or Games subscription, you can make a 4-7 letter puzzle with the NYT’s Wordle creation tool. (You’ll […]

item.title: Trump unveils deal with Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk to lower costs and expand coverage for obesity drugs
item.description: Coverage of popular obesity drugs like Wegovy and Zepbound will expand to Medicare patients starting next year, with some drugs potentially costing as little as $150. President Donald Trump unveiled a deal Thursday with drugmakers Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk to expand coverage and reduce prices for their popular obesity treatments Zepbound and Wegovy....

item.title: Xiaomi profite du pré-Black Friday pour brader ses produits les plus populaires : les 8 offres à saisir
item.description: Le coup d’envoi du pré-Black Friday a été donné chez de nombreux e-commerçants, et Xiaomi ne compte pas manquer l’événement. La marque chinoise multiplie les offres et casse les prix sur l’ensemble de ses produits phares. Découvrez ceux qui ont retenu notre attention.

item.title: Avec le Mate 70 Air, Huawei montre comment faire un téléphone fin sans tout sacrifier
item.description: Nouveau téléphone ultra-fin de Huawei : 6,6 mm d'épaisseur mais avec une batterie énorme de 6 500 mAh.

item.title: Lego’s 3,600-Piece Star Trek Enterprise Is the Holiday Gift to Buy This Year
item.description: This $400 set comes with minifigures of the complete Next Gen crew, including Picard, Riker, and Wesley Crusher’s portable tractor beam.

item.title: Apple TV Revealed a Huge ‘Pluribus’ Spoiler by Releasing Its Opening Scene Early
item.description: Vince Gilligan's new sci-fi series starring Rhea Seehorn premieres tomorrow, but you can watch its first few minutes right now.

item.title: Amazon reveals its latest slate of free PC games for Prime members, including entries from the Borderlands and Fallout series
item.description: Amazon has just unveiled its latest slate of free Prime games, featuring Fallout and Borderlands games.

item.title: Hitman developers on 25 years of the iconic stealth franchise – 'we've realized all of that potential’
item.description: We discuss the Hitman franchise with two veteran developers ahead of its 25th anniversary.

item.title: Inside Netflix’s big deal with AB InBev
item.description: Superconnector Studios CEO Jae Goodman talks about the deal and what it says about the future of brands and Hollywood. The term brand entertainment is tough to define. For many people, it’s an oxymoron and these two words should never be in the same room as one another.

item.title: U.S. mortgage rate ticks up to 6.22% after four weeks of declines
item.description: Last week’s average mortgage rate was the lowest since Oct. 3, 2024, when it was 6.12%. The average rate on a 30-year U.S. mortgage ticked up for the first time in five weeks after falling to its lowest level in more than a year last week.

item.title: Subtle Computing’s voice isolation models help computers understand you in noisy environments
item.description: Subtle Computing has raised $6M in seed funding to build voice isolation models. The startup plans to announce a hardware device next year.

item.title: The Fitbit Charge 6 is back to its lowest price ever for Black Friday
item.description: The Fitbit Charge 6 is a good all-rounder fitness tracker and it's even more appealing while it's on sale at Amazon for its lowest-ever price.

item.title: T-Mobile just launched a surprise early Black Friday sale - you can already get four free iPhone 17s without a trade-in
item.description: T-Mobile's early Black Friday deals are live - here's how to get up to four iPhone 17 for free with a super-cheap unlimited data plan.

item.title: Italian political consultant says he was targeted with Paragon spyware
item.description: WhatsApp notified the consultant, who works for left-wing politicians, that his phone was targeted with spyware made by Paragon.

item.title: En Alsace, l’usine de Huawei qui n’a jamais ouvert est visiblement déjà à vendre
item.description: L'usine Huawei de Brumath, projet à 250 millions d'euros, n'accueillera probablement jamais ses 500 employés. Ce « site fantôme » serait même déjà en vente, selon plusieurs sources.

item.title: The latest Blink Video Doorbell is over 50 percent off
item.description: With Black Friday and the holiday season approaching, packages will start piling up, making now a good time to take steps to protect your doorstep from porch pirates. Thankfully, multiple retailers are already offering early Black Friday discounts on smart security devices to help you keep tabs on deliveries, with Amazon’s and Best Buy’s deal […]

item.title: Battlefield REDSEC is a by-the-numbers battle royale that’s lacking a sense of character, but there’s no question that Battlefield fits the genre perfectly
item.description: Battlefield REDSEC is a solid foundation made up of the best bits from your other favorite games, though it’s in danger of being eclipsed by newer, more innovative competitors.

item.title: Trump admin threatens to cancel thousands of flights if shutdown continues, just in time for Thanksgiving
item.description: The FAA is cancelling flights just in time for Thanksgiving.

item.title: Here’s the List of 40 Airports Expected to Be Impacted by Shutdown Flight Reductions
item.description: The FAA is reducing flights due to the historically long government shutdown.

item.title: N’essayez pas d’effacer les rayures de votre smartphone, c’est une mauvaise idée
item.description: Si vous espériez voir disparaître les micro-rayures de votre écran de smartphone grâce à une machine de polissage, un expert vient de doucher vos espoirs.

item.title: Early Black Friday deal alert: MSI’s 27-inch Full HD monitor now only £68 with a three-year warranty
item.description: Black Friday savings start now! MSI’s PRO MP275 monitor hits record-low £68 price point.

item.title: Stranger Things: Tales From ‘85 winds the clock back in new trailer
item.description: While Stranger Things's upcoming fifth season will bring the Hawkins gang's story to a close, Netflix's new Stranger Things animated spinoff series is about to send the crew on a side quest set in the recent past. Today, Netflix dropped a teaser video for Stranger Things: Tales From '85, a new spinoff that takes place […]

item.title: These Wildly Expensive Wireless Earbuds Go Overboard on Drivers
item.description: And they're made partially of real wood, because why not?

item.title: Black Friday 2025 : les offres sont déjà nombreuses sur Amazon & Co, mais voici les meilleurs deals en avant-première
item.description: À peine novembre entamé que le Black Friday pointe déjà le bout de son nez chez certains e-commerçants français. On vous a donc préparé une sélection des meilleures offres du moment, mise à jour en temps réel, pour vous aider à dénicher les bons plans tech sans prise de tête.

item.title: University of Pennsylvania confirms recent cyberattack led to major data theft
item.description: Hackers claim to have stolen 1.2 million records, and have been insulting the University.

item.title: Keep everything charged up with the Bluetti Elite 30 v2 portable power station for its lowest price ever
item.description: As of Nov. 6, get the Bluetti Elite 30 v2 portable power station for its lowest price ever.

item.title: How the attack on trans healthcare affects every American
item.description: The erosion of freedom rarely happens overnight; it’s written into law, one ruling at a time. ACLU’s Chase Strangio lays bare how the U.S. legal system is failing its people under a growing wave of authoritarianism and systemic rollbacks of civil liberties. The erosion of freedom rarely happens overnight; it’s written into law, one ruling at a time. ACLU’s Chase Strangio lays bare how the U.S. legal system is failing its people under a growing wave of authoritarianism and systemic rollbacks of civil liberties....

item.title: Rockstar co-founder Dan Houser says Red Dead Redemption 3 'will probably happen' but would be sad not to be part of it
item.description: Red Dead Redemption 2 writer Dan Houser believes a third game will eventually be made, but has admitted he would be sad not being involved in its development.

item.title: Best Adaptogen Drinks and Functional Drinks of 2025: Get Clear
item.description: I tasted dozens of mushroom teas, kava drinks, and party drinks to find the best. Brez and Juni are the two I recommend for most people looking for focus.

item.title: La technologie de batterie que l’on attendait chez Samsung et Apple atterrit dans un Motorola pas cher
item.description: Vous pensiez que le silicium carbone, nouvelle technologie miracle pour agrandir les batteries, étaient réservée au haut de gamme ? Motorola prouve que non avec son G57 POWER.

item.title: Ecovacs Goat G1-2000 : cet excellent robot tondeuse est 1 450 € moins cher qu’à son lancement grâce au pré-Black Friday
item.description: Si l’idée de passer ses week-ends derrière une tondeuse n’a plus vraiment la cote, les robots sont devenus des alliés de choix. Faciles à configurer, discrets et efficaces et sans fil, à l’image du Goat G1-2000 d’Ecovacs. Un modèle noté 9/10 l’an dernier, qui voit aujourd’hui son prix chuter à 549 euros sur Amazon, alors qu'il en valait 2 000 euros à son lancement en novembre 2024. ...

item.title: The 7 Biggest Differences Between the ‘Running Man’ Movies
item.description: Arnold Schwarzenegger's 1987 film and Glen Powell's 2025 film are very different, but which has the edge?

item.title: Google Finance offers Gemini AI tools to stock traders
item.description: Google’s well-honed strategy of adding AI to absolutely everything continues: the company announced on Thursday that Google Finance is getting a Deep Search feature to turbocharge its AI chatbot, as well as other upgrades to support traders like prediction market support. The new Deep Search feature will let you get more detailed responses and ask […]...

item.title: New court docs put Sam Altman’s honesty in spotlight again
item.description: A lot is riding on the AI industry’s ability to apply AI productively and safely in business and personal life in the next decade. Trust is a major factor. Welcome to AI Decoded, Fast Company’s weekly newsletter that breaks down the most important news in the world of AI. I’m Mark Sullivan, a senior writer at Fast Company, covering emerging tech, AI, and tech policy....

item.title: How to restore housing market affordability, according to institutional landlord Amherst
item.description: Amherst CEO Sean Dobson believes housing affordability would improve if some of the buyers pushed out of the market after 2008 were brought back into the fold. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: Guide d’achat : les meilleurs vélos cargo longtails électriques de 2025
item.description: Les vélos cargo permettent de transporter beaucoup plus de choses que les vélos électriques classiques. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs vélos cargo électriques de type longtails que la rédaction de Frandroid a pu tester.

item.title: Score some sweet pulls with a Magic: The Gathering Tarkir: Dragonstorm - Play Booster Box for its lowest price
item.description: As of Nov. 6, get a Magic: The Gathering Tarkir: Dragonstorm - Play Booster Box for its lowest price yet.
